member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.Res
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.Res.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.Res.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.Res.Cannot_Resolve_Path
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to File name '{0}' is empty, contains invalid characters, has a drive specification without an absolute path, or is too long..

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.Res.Cannot_Resolve_Reference
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Assembly reference '{0}' is invalid and cannot be resolved..

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.Res.Compilation_Arguments
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Compilation parameters:.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.Res.Compiler_Failed_To_Create_File
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot create file: {0}. The error message is {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.Res.Compiler_Failed_To_Open_File
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot open file: {0}. The error message is {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.Res.Copyright
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved..

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.Res.Internal_Compiler_Error
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Internal Compiler Error: {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.Res.Product_Name
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to CodeDOM Providers for .NET Compiler Platform (“Roslyn”).

member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.CommonCodeProvider
member.summary: Provides a base class for CodeDomProvider implementations that use the .NET Compiler Platform. This class is abstract.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.CommonCodeProvider.CreateGenerator
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new code generator.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.CommonCodeProvider.GetConverter(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets a for the specified data type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.CommonCodeProvider.FileExtension
member.summary: Gets the default file name extension to use for source code files in the current language.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.CSharpCodeProvider
member.summary: Provides access to instances of the .NET Compiler Platform C# code generator and code compiler.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeDom.Providers.DotNetCompilerPlatform.CSharpCodeProvider.CreateCompiler
member.summary: Gets an instance of the .NET Compiler Platform C# code compiler.
member.returns: An instance of the .NET Compiler Platform C# code compiler
